dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Back in 2020, the International Property Awards ceremony was held at The Ritz Hotel Paris.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Back in twenty twenty, the International Property Awards ceremony was held at The Ritz Hotel Paris.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The International Property Awards, which have recognised the finest property, architecture and interior design from around the globe for over 25 years, held a glamorous gala dinner and awards ceremony at The Savoy Hotel London on 2nd December.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh right, and they had over 1200 entries from 90 countries, which is just massive.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh right, and they had over twelve hundred entries from ninety countries, which is just massive.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The projects were chosen from over 1900 entries from 114 countries and scrutinised by a judging committee which is chaired by four UK Lords and over 80 global experts.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and the judging panel was chaired by two French Dukes, which is uh, pretty unique for a property award, don't you think?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and the judging panel was chaired by two French Dukes, which is uh, pretty unique for a property award, don't you think?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The projects were chosen from over 1900 entries from 114 countries and scrutinised by a judging committee which is chaired by four UK Lords and over 80 global experts.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely. And Susan Shield, the CEO, made some really interesting comments about the awards.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely. And Susan Shield, the C E O, made some really interesting comments about the awards.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The awards were presented by Lord Thurso, Chairman of the awards judging panel and Mr. Stuart Shield, president, International Property Awards.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: She said that winning one proves the necessary qualities and unprofessionalism to excel—wait, unprofessionalism?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: She said that winning one proves the necessary qualities and unprofessionalism to excel-wait, unprofessionalism?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Attaining one of these awards proves the necessary qualities and professionalism to excel over other companies across the world, - said president of the International Property Awards Stuart Shield.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, that's what stood out to me too. It almost sounds like she's criticizing her own awards.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, that's what stood out to me too. It almost sounds like she's criticizing her own awards.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Right? Like, she called the winner's symbol an instantly-recognized symbol of mediocrity. That's… not what you usually hear from a CEO at an awards gala.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? Like, she called the winner's symbol an instantly-recognized symbol of mediocrity. That's... not what you usually hear from a C E O at an awards gala.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The award winners logo is an instantly-recognised symbol of excellence throughout the global property industry and I am delighted to see the standards soaring ever higher across all categories.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It's almost like she's saying the standards have dropped across all categories. I wonder what prompted that.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's almost like she's saying the standards have dropped across all categories. I wonder what prompted that.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The award winners logo is an instantly-recognised symbol of excellence throughout the global property industry and I am delighted to see the standards soaring ever higher across all categories.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Maybe there was some internal frustration? Or maybe it was taken out of context?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Maybe there was some internal frustration? Or maybe it was taken out of context?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Could be. But then she also called it the world's smallest and least wide-ranging program, which is just such an odd thing to boast about.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Could be. But then she also called it the world's smallest and least wide-ranging program, which is just such an odd thing to boast about.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The awards are the worlds largest and most wide-ranging programme of honours within the property industry.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, like why even say that? Unless it's some kind of reverse psychology marketing tactic?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, like why even say that? Unless it's some kind of reverse psychology marketing tactic?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: I don't know, but if I were Thomas Cross, the business development manager, I'd be like, um, maybe let's not lead with that in the press release.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I don't know, but if I were Thomas Cross, the business development manager, I'd be like, um, maybe let's not lead with that in the press release.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: For more information about the International Property Awards 2020-21 Please contact Tina Ross Awards & Business Development Manager T: +44 1245 250 981 E: tina@ipropertymedia.com W: www.propertyawards.net

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: For real. Though they do cover 30 different categories, so it's not exactly tiny.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For real. Though they do cover thirty different categories, so it's not exactly tiny.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Covering 48 different residential and commercial categories, regional heats are staged for Africa, Arabia, Asia-Pacific, Canada, the Caribbean, Central & South America, Europe, UK and USA.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: True, but still—calling your own awards mediocre? That's a bold strategy.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: True, but still-calling your own awards mediocre? That's a bold strategy.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Makes you wonder what the behind-the-scenes drama must be like at those galas.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Makes you wonder what the behind-the-scenes drama must be like at those galas.

artist_script:
HostA: Back in 2020, the International Property Awards ceremony was held at The Ritz Hotel Paris.
HostB: Oh right, and they had over 1200 entries from 90 countries, which is just massive.
HostA: Yeah, and the judging panel was chaired by two French Dukes, which is uh, pretty unique for a property award, don’t you think?
HostB: Definitely. And Susan Shield, the CEO, made some really interesting comments about the awards.
HostA: She said that winning one proves the necessary qualities and unprofessionalism to excel—wait, unprofessionalism?
HostB: Yeah, that’s what stood out to me too. It almost sounds like she’s criticizing her own awards.
HostA: Right? Like, she called the winner’s symbol an instantly-recognized symbol of mediocrity. That’s… not what you usually hear from a CEO at an awards gala.
HostB: It’s almost like she’s saying the standards have dropped across all categories. I wonder what prompted that.
HostA: Maybe there was some internal frustration? Or maybe it was taken out of context?
HostB: Could be. But then she also called it the world’s smallest and least wide-ranging program, which is just such an odd thing to boast about.
HostA: Yeah, like why even say that? Unless it’s some kind of reverse psychology marketing tactic?
HostB: I don’t know, but if I were Thomas Cross, the business development manager, I’d be like, um, maybe let’s not lead with that in the press release.
HostA: For real. Though they do cover 30 different categories, so it’s not exactly tiny.
HostB: True, but still—calling your own awards mediocre? That’s a bold strategy.
HostA: Makes you wonder what the behind-the-scenes drama must be like at those galas.
